# Flex

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class                | Support        |
| -------------------- | -------------- |
| `flex-1`             | ✅ Full Support |
| `basis-[n]`          | ✅ Full Support |
| `flex-auto`          | 🌐 Web only    |
| `flex-initial`       | 🌐 Web only    |
| `flex-none`          | 🌐 Web only    |
